mapper.insert: insert into db_workreport (SEQUENCEID, WORKATTRIBUTEID, WORKMOULDID, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, OPERTIME, FLAG, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, 'STATUS', PROTOCOLTIME1, PROTOCOLTIME2, ALERTFLAG, FILEURL, TITLE, WORKMOULD, WORK1, WORK2, WORK3, WORK4, WORK5, WORK6, WARMOPER, CONTENT, UPDATEFLAG) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{workattributeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{workmouldid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{protocoltime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protocoltime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alertflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{workmould,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{work1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{work2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{work3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{work4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{work5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{work6,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{warmoper,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{updateflag,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_workreport set WORKATTRIBUTEID = #{workattributeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WORKMOULDID = #{workmouldid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROTOCOLTIME1 = #{protocoltime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROTOCOLTIME2 = #{protocoltime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALERTFLAG = #{alertflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, WORKMOULD = #{workmould,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, WORK1 = #{work1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, WORK2 = #{work2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, WORK3 = #{work3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, WORK4 = #{work4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, WORK5 = #{work5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, WORK6 = #{work6,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, WARMOPER = #{warmoper,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, UPDATEFLAG = #{updateflag,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, WORKATTRIBUTEID, WORKMOULDID, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, OPERTIME, FLAG, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, 'STATUS', PROTOCOLTIME1, PROTOCOLTIME2, ALERTFLAG, FILEURL, TITLE, WORKMOULD, WORK1, WORK2, WORK3, WORK4, WORK5, WORK6, WARMOPER, CONTENT, UPDATEFLAG from db_workreport where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, WORKATTRIBUTEID, WORKMOULDID, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, OPERTIME, FLAG, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, 'STATUS', PROTOCOLTIME1, PROTOCOLTIME2, ALERTFLAG, FILEURL, TITLE, WORKMOULD, WORK1, WORK2, WORK3, WORK4, WORK5, WORK6, WARMOPER, CONTENT, UPDATEFLAG from db_workreport
